description: Roasted red capsicums pack far more flavour into this easy recipe than traditional tomato soup.
keywords: Tomato soup,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Tomato, Basil & Capsicum Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large red capsicums, sliced into quarters
2 large red onions, peeled and cut into wedges
2.4 cup vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Place the capsicums, red onions, cherry tomatoes and garlic in a roasting tray, drizzle with half the oil and roast for 30 minutes.
Add the remaining oil to a large, deep pan on a medium heat and tip the roasted vegetables in. Squeeze the garlic out of its skin and add to the pan. Add the jarred capsicums and pour over the stock.

Bring to the boil and cook for 5 minutes. Add half the torn basil, remove from the heat and blitz until smooth with an immersion blender. Season with cracked black pepper, top with extra basil and serve.
